Name: [Research] Resource Conversion
Desc: Every 100 Gear Coins spent increases all squad members' DMG by <color=#2BAD00>0.5%</color> (Current Bonus: {CReplaceCardParam:DamageShow,0.1,2}%. Maximum: 50%.)
Desc2:
An exquisitely designed badge.
A special Resonium issued by the White Star Institute to Investigators of Hollow Zero, for research on resource conversion-related matters.
